General.Name: Fiskars Oyj Abp
General.Description: Fiskars Oyj Abp manufactures and markets consumer products in Europe, the Americas, and the Asia Pacific. The company operates through Vita, Terra, Crea, and Other segments. It offers various products for the tableware, drinkware, and interior products under Iittala, Royal Copenhagen, Moomin by Arabia, Waterford, and Wedgwood brands; and provides gardening, watering, and outdoor products under Fiskars and Gerber brands. In addition, the company offers scissors and creating, as well as the cooking products under the Fiskars brand. Fiskars Oyj Abp was founded in 1649 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
